Entry.en-US: Inspired by the link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM), {0_family} link(TRIBE_REBELS) of {2_city} have taken up arms for their religion and formed {3,1_unit} near the City!
Entry.es: ¡Inspirados por la link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM), los link(TRIBE_REBELS) {0,1_family} de {2_city} han tomado las armas en nombre de su religión y han creado {3,1_unit} cerca de la ciudad!
Entry.de: Inspiriert durch den link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM), haben {0_family} link(TRIBE_REBELS) von {2_city} die Waffen für ihre Religion ergriffen und {3,1_unit} in der Nähe der Stadt gebildet!
Entry.fr: Inspirés par le link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM), les link(TRIBE_REBELS) {0_family} de {2_city} ont pris les armes pour défendre leur religion et ont formé une {3,1_unit} près de la cité !
Entry.ja: link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM)に啓発され、{2_city}の{0_family} link(TRIBE_REBELS)家が、自身が奉じる宗教のために武器を取り、都市の周辺で{3,1_unit}を集結させている！
Entry.zh-TW: 受到link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM)的啟發，{2_city}的{0_family}link(TRIBE_REBELS)為了捍衛自己的宗教，紛紛拿起武器，在城市周邊組成了{3,1_unit}！
Entry.ru: Вдохновившись link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM,4), link(TRIBE_REBELS) {0,1_family} из {2,1_city} решили сражаться за свою веру и сформировали рядом с городом {3,1_unit}.

Entry.pt-BR: Inspirados pela link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM), link(TRIBE_REBELS) da família {0_family} de {2_city} se armaram em nome da religião e criaram uma {3,3_unit} perto da cidade!
Entry.ko: link(EFFECTCITY_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM)에 고취된 {2_city}의 {0_family} 가문 link(TRIBE_REBELS)이 도시 근처에 {3,1_unit}(을)를 모아 봉기를 일으켰습니다!
